Direct Known Subclasses:
LimitNamesTermIssuerLong, LimitNamesTermIssuerShort, LimitNamesTermIssuerTotal
public abstract class LimitNamesTermIssuer
extends ConstraintTerm
LimitNamesTermIssuer holds the Details of a Limit Count of Issuer Names Constraint Term.

  • Module = Portfolio Core Module
  • Library = Asset Allocation Analytics
  • Project = Portfolio Construction under Allocation Constraints
  • Package = Portfolio Construction Constraint Term Suite
